configurations.name: GetChallenge - Run AWS Lambda locally
runtimeArgs: AWS_PROFILE=ai2 sam build && sam local invoke OlmoeAttestS3LoggingFunction -e tests/get_challenge.json --parameter-overrides $(cat .env.json | jq -r 'to_entries | map("\(.key)=\(.value|tostring)") | .[]')

configurations.name: ShareTrace - Run AWS Lambda locally
runtimeArgs: AWS_PROFILE=ai2 sam build && sam local invoke OlmoeAttestS3LoggingFunction -e tests/prod_attest.json --parameter-overrides $(cat .env.json | jq -r 'to_entries | map("\(.key)=\(.value|tostring)") | .[]')
